issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: JDBC2 does not support VOID type

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Thrift API
components.description: Tracks changes to the Hive Thrift APIs

fields.description:
running 'ant thriftif -Dthrift.home=/usr/local'  on a freshly checkedout trunk should be a no-op as per [instructions|https://cwiki.apache.org/Hive/howtocontribute.html#HowToContribute-GeneratingThriftCode]

However this is not the case. Some of files seem to be have been relocated or the classes in them are now in a different file.

Below is the git status showing the state after the command is run:


# On branch trunk
# Changes not staged for commit:
#   (use "git add/rm <file>..." to update what will be committed)
#   (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
#
#	modified:   build.properties
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Database.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/EnvironmentContext.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Index.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Partition.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/PrincipalPrivilegeSet.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Schema.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/SerDeInfo.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/SkewedInfo.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/StorageDescriptor.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Table.java
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/ThriftHiveMetastore.java
#	deleted:    metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/ThriftHiveMetastore.php
#	deleted:    metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore/ThriftHiveMetastore.php
#	deleted:    metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore/hive_metastore_constants.php
#	deleted:    metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore/hive_metastore_types.php
#	deleted:    metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore_constants.php
#	deleted:    metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore_types.php
#	modified:   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-py/hive_metastore/ThriftHiveMetastore-remote
#	deleted:    ql/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/queryplan/queryplan_types.php
#	modified:   serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde/test/InnerStruct.java
#	modified:   serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde/test/ThriftTestObj.java
#	modified:   serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/Complex.java
#	modified:   serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/IntString.java
#	modified:   serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/MegaStruct.java
#	modified:   serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/MiniStruct.java
#	deleted:    serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/serde/serde_constants.php

#	deleted:    service/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_service/ThriftHive.php

#
# Untracked files:
#   (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
#
#	serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-cpp/complex_constants.cpp

fields.summary: ant thriftif  generated code that is checkedin is not up-to-date

comments.body:
*DELETED FILES*
----------------------------
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/ThriftHiveMetastore.php  
{quote}above file is file{quote}

metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore/ThriftHiveMetastore.php  
{quote}above file moved to  ->  metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/ThriftHiveMetastore.php{quote}

metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/metastore/ThriftHiveMetastore.php
{quote}moved to -> ./metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/metastore/ThriftHiveMetastore.php{quote}

metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore/hive_metastore_constants.php 
{quote}contents are now in  ->   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/metastore/Types.php{quote}

metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_metastore/hive_metastore_types.php
{quote}contents are now in  ->   metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/metastore/Types.php {quote}

{quote}empty file {quote}

{quote}empty file{quote}

{quote}contents are now in  ->  ql/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/Types.php {quote}

serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/serde/serde_constants.php
{quote} contents are now in  ->  serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde/Types.php  {quote}

serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/serde/serde_types.php
{quote} appears to be superceeded by -> serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde/Types.php{quote}

service/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_service/ThriftHive.php
{quote} contents are now in   -> service/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/ThriftHive.php  {quote}

service/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/hive_service/hive_service_types.php
{quote} contents are now in -> service/src/gen/thrift/gen-php/Types.php{quote}



*MODIFIED FILES*:
-------------------------

metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Database.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/EnvironmentContext.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Index.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Partition.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/PrincipalPrivilegeSet.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Schema.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/SerDeInfo.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/SkewedInfo.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/StorageDescriptor.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Table.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/ThriftHiveMetastore.java
{quote}In each of the above files, only change is inside comments. word 'optional' changed to 'required'{quote}

serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde/test/InnerStruct.java 
serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde/test/ThriftTestObj.java  
serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/Complex.java 
serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/IntString.java  
serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/MegaStruct.java 
serde/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/thrift/test/MiniStruct.java 
{quote}In each of the above classes, the hashCode() method used to always return 0. Now it returns a real hash code {quote}

service/src/gen/thrift/gen-py/TCLIService/TCLIService-remote
service/src/gen/thrift/gen-py/hive_service/ThriftHive-remote
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-py/hive_metastore/ThriftHiveMetastore-remote  
{quote} In each of the above files, the permissions changed from 644 to 755{quote}



*ADDED FILES*
-------------------------
{quote}All are serde related. Unclear why they were never part of the code base to begin with.{quote}
correction... note on the first file was meant to read 'the above file is empty'

Atleast optional Vs required in comments can be attributed to THRIFT-1757 I assume you are on OSX, do you see similar behavior on linux too. Also, php code seems like has moved to another location. We should clean that up.
Yes I did that on Mac.  Just confirmed that the situation is the same on Linux too.
patch for thrift-0.9.0 generated files
revised patch .. removing the changes to build.properties which is part of HIVE-4296
[~roshan_naik] Conflicted with HIVE-4322. Could you rebase this again?
rebasing to trunk
[~ashutoshc] Could you commit this? I tried but I couldn't.
FYI.. HIVE-4322 makes manual changes to auto generated code. This will be a maintenance headache. I have incorporated those changes into this as part of the rebasing in patch v2.
@Roshan: Which autogenerated files were manually changed in HIVE-4322?
i take that back.. it looked like a manual change in the python file.. but i just double checked.. it seems ok.
FYI.. the general inconsistency that led me to file this jira was most likely because some of the auto-generated files checked into trunk were produced using thrift v 0.7

[~roshan_naik], I ran all the tests for HIVE-4389 (all of them ran fine other than leadlag.q,
which is also failing on trunk, for which I have filed a jira HIVE-4394.

There, I had just performed:

ant thriftif -Dthrift.home=/usr/local
on my mac -- no local changes.
Did you do anything differently ?

I got fewer changes than yours. For eg:

metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Database.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/EnvironmentContext.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Index.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Partition.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/PrincipalPrivilegeSet.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Schema.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/SerDeInfo.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/SkewedInfo.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/StorageDescriptor.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/Table.java
metastore/src/gen/thrift/gen-javabean/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/api/ThriftHiveMetastore.java
In each of the above files, only change is inside comments. word 'optional' changed to 'required'


none of the above files changed.

Namit,
 Those files are no longer part of  patch v2.
 The files you point out got updated by the HIVE-4322 which got committed first.

[~roshan_naik], did you do anything different ?
or just 
ant thriftif -Dthrift.home=...
on a mac.
just that much.

ok, I will compare the patch with my patch - it should be same, and then
merge it.

The results are same.

+1
[~namit] Can you take care of committing it?
sure, running tests
Committed. Thanks Roshan
